doc.title: Every Night and Twice on Sundays
doc.plot: Take a wonderfully wacky ride with Glenn Kiser and James Michael Hughes as they shine a spotlight on the world's greatest undiscovered star. At last the curtain rises on Dorothy McHugh, the "actress" extraordinare who captivated T.V. viewers around the world in the unforgettable "I've fallen and I can't get up" commercial. In Every Night and Twice on Sundays, this 81-year-young showgirl-turned-landlady gets her 15 minutes of fame in this bittersweet valentine to a local hero who proves that there is a pot of gold waiting for those who never give up on their dreams.
